document_data.name: Cryptskulls
document_data.base: The [[Crypt of the Arisen Army]], [[Skull Gorge]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cryptskulls''' were the general clergy of [[Velsharoon]] within the [[Crypt of the Arisen Army]].
document_data.Activities: In addition to their duties within the temple, the Cryptskulls haunted the entire length of [[Skull Gorge]] and the [[Battle of Bones]]. They were aided by an [[undead]] army that guarded their territory from intruders.
document_data.Members: Baron [[Vjurn Blacktower]] was their high priest, or [[necrophant]], and provided their orders.
